scripts.build: npm i && npm run ios.prepare && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-wikitude && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run plugin.prepare.ng && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare.ng: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-wikitude && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-wikitude && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
